item.title: WATCH: Paraglider survives nearly 500-foot fall into ocean
item.description: A paraglider survived a nearly 500-foot fall into the ocean off the coast of Florida, authorities say.

item.title: Teen suspect in Mississippi synagogue fire indicted on state hate crime charges
item.description: The suspect allegedly set the fire due to the building’s “Jewish ties,” the FBI said in a charging affidavit.

item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting updates: At least 4 prosecutors resign over probe into Good
item.description: At least four federal prosecutors have resigned out of concerns that the Department is focusing on investigating Renee Good for ties to groups that ha...

item.title: Some of the military options Trump could consider against Iran
item.description: The president's top national security advisers met Tuesday to consider action against Iran over its crackdown on protesters.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
